readme_content:
--- ## **About Me** - 🔭 **Currently working on:** Cloud, Backend, and AI projects! - 🌱 **Learning:** Advanced **Docker CI/CD**, **Vector DBs**, and **GitHub Actions** - Check out my [portfolio](https://aswin.radr.in)! or [devb.io](https://devb.io/aswinpradeepc)
![Profile view counter](https://komarev.com/ghpvc/?username=aswinpradeepc) --- ## 🛠 **Tech Stack**

--- ## 🛠️ Projects | **Project** | **Description** | **Technologies Used** | |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | [**LinkRadr**](https://github.com/aswinpradeepc/linkradr) |[Live: link.radr.in](https://link.radr.in) A scalable **URL shortener** with features like **custom short links** and **OTP-based authentication**. aswinpradeepc/llmsearch.summary: Recent activities in aswinpradeepc/llmsearch repository included dockerization, updating version 0, and implementing a prototype. These changes suggest improvements to the search functionality and preparation for deployment.

aswinpradeepc/website.summary: Recent activities in aswinpradeepc/website repository involved updating the resume section, indicating ongoing efforts to maintain a professional online presence and updating personal information.

aswinpradeepc/pitchmailer.summary: A single recent activity in aswinpradeepc/pitchmailer repository included renaming the README file from README.txt to README.md, which is a common and accepted practice in GitHub repositories.

aswinpradeepc/radr-landing.summary: Recent activities in aswinpradeepc/radr-landing repository included adding middleware for link redirection, adding a favicon, and implementing features and fixes such as automated updation in deployment and adding services-grid-layout. These changes indicate ongoing development and deployment improvements.

profile_summary: As a seasoned CSE student and industry professional, I leverage my expertise in Python, C++, and TypeScript to drive innovation in Cloud, Backend, and Machine Learning projects. With 52 public repositories, I continue to expand my technical horizons and foster growth through contributions to the developer community. An enthusiastic Backend Engineer and Linux user, I embrace a holistic approach to software development, powered by my passion for coding, problem-solving, and collaboration.
